text: {"fixed_xml":"<file name=\"line_13.json\"><xml_string><ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgeliefert: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annokationibus Honrici Stephani Locupletatus</TITLE>. Nova cura retensuit digessit &c. <AUTHOR>Ant. Birrius</AUTHOR>. <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL> Ingleichen geben sie auch den <BIBL><TITLE>T. Lieium e. Integr. Sigonii & Gronovior Norit</TITLE> in <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME> auf schön Schreib-Median-Pappier in <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT> † <PRICE currency=\"fl\">6.</PRICE> künftige Wochen an die Herren Liebhaber aus, dieser Preis aber währet nur bis Ende Januarii <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. nach welcher Zeit kein Exemplar unter <PRICE currency=\"fl\">7</PRICE> <PRICE currency=\"xr\">30</PRICE> verkaufft werden solle.</ITEM></xml_string></file>","number_of_corrections":13,"explanation":"The original XML string contained several issues, including Unicode characters that were not properly encoded, missing XML tags, and incorrect formatting. The corrections made include: (1) wrapping the original string in a CDATA section or properly encoding special characters, but since the output format is JSON and the input is a mix of JSON and XML, we directly corrected the XML; (2) replacing Unicode characters with their corresponding representations or entities; (3) adding XML tags where necessary to provide structure; (4) correcting 'PRIZE' to 'PRICE' and adding a 'currency' attribute to provide more context; (5) ensuring that '&' is properly encoded as '&'; (6) fixing 'k\u00041nfftige' to 'künftige', 'w\u00041hret' to 'währet', 'bi\u00041\u00064 Ende' to 'bis Ende', 'Prei\u00041\u00064' to 'Preis', 'Eremplar' to 'Exemplar', 'sch\u00041n' to 'schön'; (7) replacing '\u00041' and similar Unicode escapes with their actual characters or proper representations; (8) interpreting '\u00041' as a potential typo or misrepresentation and correcting accordingly; (9) changing '\u00064' to 's' or appropriate character; (10) directly representing '†' as it is a valid XML character; (11) ensuring proper nesting and closure of XML tags; (12) directly correcting 'fl. 6.' and '7fl. 30. xr.' to use 'PRICE' tags with a 'currency' attribute; (13) wrapping the content in 'xml_string' tag and the whole in 'file' tag to adhere to the original structure."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <file name="line_13.json"><xml_string><ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgeliefert: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annokationibus Honrici Stephani Locupletatus</TITLE>. Nova cura retensuit digessit &c. <AUTHOR>Ant. Birrius</AUTHOR>. <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL> Ingleichen geben sie auch den <BIBL><TITLE>T. Lieium e. Integr. Sigonii & Gronovior Norit</TITLE> in <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME> auf schön Schreib-Median-Pappier in <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT> † <PRICE currency="fl">6.</PRICE> künftige Wochen an die Herren Liebhaber aus, dieser Preis aber währet nur bis Ende Januarii <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. nach welcher Zeit kein Exemplar unter <PRICE currency="fl">7</PRICE> <PRICE currency="xr">30</PRICE> verkaufft werden solle.</ITEM></xml_string></file>
parsed.explanation: The original XML string contained several issues, including Unicode characters that were not properly encoded, missing XML tags, and incorrect formatting. The corrections made include: (1) wrapping the original string in a CDATA section or properly encoding special characters, but since the output format is JSON and the input is a mix of JSON and XML, we directly corrected the XML; (2) replacing Unicode characters with their corresponding representations or entities; (3) adding XML tags where necessary to provide structure; (4) correcting 'PRIZE' to 'PRICE' and adding a 'currency' attribute to provide more context; (5) ensuring that '&' is properly encoded as '&'; (6) fixing 'k1nfftige' to 'künftige', 'w1hret' to 'währet', 'bi14 Ende' to 'bis Ende', 'Prei14' to 'Preis', 'Eremplar' to 'Exemplar', 'sch1n' to 'schön'; (7) replacing '1' and similar Unicode escapes with their actual characters or proper representations; (8) interpreting '1' as a potential typo or misrepresentation and correcting accordingly; (9) changing '4' to 's' or appropriate character; (10) directly representing '†' as it is a valid XML character; (11) ensuring proper nesting and closure of XML tags; (12) directly correcting 'fl. 6.' and '7fl. 30. xr.' to use 'PRICE' tags with a 'currency' attribute; (13) wrapping the content in 'xml_string' tag and the whole in 'file' tag to adhere to the original structure.
